author: Patrick Tomasso
description:
#movies #cinema #onebattleafteranother 

Paul Thomas Anderson’s ONE BATTLE AFTER ANOTHER is one of the best-looking films I’ve seen in years. The cinematography feels raw, messy, and alive - like the movies I grew up falling in love with.

We’ve been living in an era where so much looks shiny, clean, and safe… like everything has to fit into a prestige-TV box. But this movie does the opposite. It’s gritty, contrasty, sometimes borderline “wrong” - and that’s exactly why it looks so good.

Movies like this remind you why you love movies.

If you care about cinema, don’t wait for streaming. Go see this one on the big screen.

Follow me everywhere @impatrickt | second channel @sloppysteaks
title: Why this movie looks like a *movie*
